title: What are the requirements to use Collaborate?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am interested in using Unity Collaborate and want to know what requirements, if any, are needed.

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to know what are the requirements to use Unity Collaborate, such as Unity version.

sections.title: Resolution
content: The requirements for Unity Collaborate are the following:

• Unity 5.5+
  • A Unity ID
  • A fast, reliable internet connection commensurate with the size of your project

sections.title: More Information
content: We recommend using the most recent version, but if you need access to Unity Collaborate in 5.4, please contact us.
